lines.text: Father of lights
You are all that I want to see
Shine on me
Sweet Lamb of God
Come and pour Your life over me
Over me
I will hope in You for You are all I need
I will trust in You a - lone
Light of the world,   Lamb that was slain
Ev'ry knee will bow before Your holy name
King of all Kings, true Prince of Peace
I worship You, I fall down to my knees
I hope in you,
Light of the world
Spirit of God
Come and breathe Your life into me
Into me
Light of the world
Won't You come and shine Your light on me
Shine on me
